DOC.brief_summary: Objective : It unclear whether prolonged electrical muscle stimulation improve cardiorespiratory fitness reduce body fat obese subject . The purpose study investigate effect prolong combine thermal electrical muscle stimulation ( cTEMS ) peak oxygen consumption ( VO2 peak ) body composition . We also investigate biochemical effect resultant lipolysis-related gene expression change adipocytes . Methods : Eleven obese ( BMI≥30 ) individual receive cTEMS three 60-minute session per week 8 week . Activity level dietary habit keep unchanged control accelerometer nutritional questionnaire . Before stimulation period , functional capacity assess VO2 peak , body composition assess dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry bioelectrical impedance analysis . Lipolytic activity determine abdominal adipose tissue 24 hour microdialysis sedentary day , adipose tissue biopsy take gene expression analysis .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Combined Thermal Electrical Muscle Stimulation ( cTEMS ) Obesity
DOC.criteria: Obese ( Body mass index ; BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 ) , sedentary subject ( < 20 minute exercise < 3 day per week ) . Other inclusion criterion age 30 70 year ability undergo exercise testing . Pacemaker implant defibrillator , regular medication , cardiovascular disease , pulmonary disease , extensive dermatological disease primary disease ; pregnant woman ; individual abuse alcohol drug exclude study
